remove_tray_from_oven.description: Remove the oven tray from the inside.

insert_tray_into_oven.description: Insert the oven tray back into oven.

pull_out_oven_tray.description: Pull out the oven tray for accessibility.

push_in_oven_tray.description: Push the oven tray back in to keep it inside.

place_tray_back.description: Place the oven tray back inside the oven.

shut_oven_door.description: Shut the oven door to start cooking.

leave_door_open.description: As the oven door is already open, no action is needed.

close_oven_door.description: Close the oven door by swinging it on its hinge to the closed position.

maintain_open_door.description: The oven door is already open, so no action is needed.

open_oven_door.description: The oven door is already open.

hold_open_oven_door.description: The oven door is already open.

lift_oven_door.description: Lift the oven door to access the inside.

leave_door_closed.description: As the oven door is already closed, no action is needed.

open_oven_door.description: Open the oven door by swinging it on its hinge to the open position.

maintain_closed_door.description: The oven door is already closed, so no action is needed.

close_oven_door.description: The oven door is already close.

hold_closed_oven_door.description: The oven door is already closed.

wipe_inside_of_oven.description: Wipe the inside part of the oven to eliminate any residues.

wipe_oven_surface.description: Wipe the surface part of the oven to keep it clean.

wipe_oven_tray_clean.description: Wipe the oven tray to ensure sanitary food preparation.

wipe_down_entire_oven.description: Wipe down all parts of the oven including the body, door, and tray for a thorough cleaning.

clean_inside_oven.description: Clean the inside part of the oven to remove any residue or spills.

clean_oven_exterior.description: Clean the outside part of the oven to maintain visibility and functionality.

clean_oven_tray.description: Clean the oven tray to ensure hygienic cooking.

clean_entire_oven.description: Clean all the parts of the oven including the oven body, door, and tray for complete maintenance.

clean_oven_body.description: Clean the oven body to remove any residue or spills.

clean_oven_door.description: Clean the oven door to maintain visibility and functionality.

clean_whole_oven.description: Clean the entire oven including the oven body, door, and tray.

wipe_oven_body.description: Wipe the oven body to clean any residue or spills.

press_oven_body.description: Press the oven body to ensure it's firm and well assembled.

pick_up_wipe_oven_door.description: Pick up the oven door, clean it and then place it back.

rotate_oven_tray.description: Rotate the oven tray for even cooking.

maintain_oven.description: Maintain the entire oven including the oven body, door, and tray.
